rooms.description: Spacious entry area with art deco detailing and Vastu-compliant north-west orientation.
Open-plan living space integrated with dining, with large windows to maximize natural light. Features geometric art deco patterns and functional zoning for joint family gatherings.
Modern kitchen with art deco accents, located in the east wing following Vastu recommendations to enhance energy flow. Includes ample storage and ventilation.
A landscaped central courtyard serving as a light well and communal garden space for the joint family, encouraging natural ventilation.

openings.details: Large casement windows with geometric patterns to maximize daylight and cross-ventilation in line with Vastu principles.
Reinforced art deco door leading into the central courtyard.
Direct access to an outdoor patio, enhancing ventilation and interaction with natural surroundings.

rooms.description: An expansive rooftop terrace featuring art deco design elements, built-in seating, and a pergola to shade family gatherings. The terrace is designed for natural ventilation and light.
A split-level studio apartment with an open living-dining area and a mezzanine bedroom loft. Designed for privacy within the joint family setup, incorporating art deco aesthetics.

openings.details: Access to a private balcony that overlooks the central courtyard and offers natural light.
